detaileddescription.para:
Make the bar symmetric to zero. The indicator will grow from zero instead of the minimum position.
bar
pointer to a bar object
en
true: enable disable symmetric behavior; false: disable
Deprecated
As of v7.0, you should use lv_bar_set_type instead.

Get whether the bar is symmetric or not.
bar
pointer to a bar object
true: symmetric is enabled; false: disable Deprecated
As of v7.0, you should use lv_bar_get_type instead.

Make the slider symmetric to zero. The indicator will grow from zero instead of the minimum position.
slider
pointer to a bar object
en
true: enable disable symmetric behavior; false: disable
Deprecated
As of v7.0, you should use lv_slider_set_type instead.

Get whether the slider is symmetric or not.
slider
pointer to a slider object
true: symmetric is enabled; false: disable Deprecated
As of v7.0, you should use lv_slider_get_type instead.

Set a fixed width for the roller.
roller
pointer to a roller object
w
width
Deprecated
As of v7.0, you should use lv_roller_set_auto_fit and set the width normally instead.

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *obj, const lv_obj_t *base, lv_align_t align, lv_coord_t x_ofs, lv_coord_t y_ofs)
memberdef.name: lv_obj_align_origo
